You have to agree to the terms and conditions before using the app.
Targeted Harassment will make you subject to disciplinary action.
Threats of violence will result in a permanent ban.
Posting personal information will make you subject to disciplinary action.
Spamming will make you subject to disciplinary action.
This app is compliant with all US laws including libel laws.
This app is only for use by Umass Lowell students
